abstracts.cdata!:
The Geothermal Exploration Project will
            help accelerate geothermal exploration and define
            Kenya's potential for continued geothermal development
            (primarily for electric power generation), specifically
            through exploration drilling in the Eburru region and
            exploration and appraisal/delineation drilling in the
            Olkaria region to identify the areas with the best prospects
            for future steam production. In addition, the project is
            designed to strengthen the sectoral institutions in charge
            of geothermal exploration and develop more efficient
            policies and procedures in the geothermal subsector through
            the provision of technical assistance and subsector studies.
